projects.title: Generated Generative Art
projects.description: New artwork generated daily, inspired by quotes. GPT writes the code to create generative art using Javascript on a canvas. An experiment in reliably generating code.

projects.title: This Website Does Not Exist - AI Web Developer
projects.description: CodeGen are pre-trained, open source, code generation models of various sizes (up to 16.1B parameters). I found that the fastest & smallest multi-language model would get confused between programming languages. My idea was combining 2 models, fine-tuned on HTML and CSS respectively, to generate "full websites". However, this model is still too small to generate reliable/helpful code.
projects.image_alt: a screenshot of css code generated by an LLM

projects.title: Nail Biting - Detection & Alert
projects.description: Take a photo with the webcam every 2 seconds, send a notification if nail biting is detected in the image. Powered by a CNN. The preprocessed dataset is available on huggingface.
projects.image_alt: The weights and biases learning curve, nail biting dataset samples

projects.title: Latent Space Museum
projects.description: A place to explore text-to-image art generations. Synthesised Images arranged by CLIP or Colour into a 2D world. HTML5 game served with FastAPI in a docker container.
projects.image_alt: A screenshot from the game play of the latent space museum

projects.title: Bias in Image generation models
projects.description: Comparing gender bias in recent text to image models. Creating a dataset across Midjourney, Stable diffusion, Dalle2, Craiyon & Google images
projects.image_alt: a graph comparing the presence of gender in image gen models

projects.title: Pysimulacra - python wrapper for SAC AI art Dataset
projects.description: Built to help make Image Generation data more accessible. SQL -> pandas wrapper.

projects.title: Collaborative Playlist
projects.description: A twitter post called for music recommendations, they were good tunes so I scraped the thread for links, this playlist is the result

projects.title: ConvRGB - Colour Feature extraction tool
projects.description: Python package with a convolutional model & palette algorithm to extract RGB features from given image/s.
projects.image_alt: an image generated with an AI model, 'a generation of all rgb colors, computer graphics, image'

projects.title: Homemade Electric Drumkit
projects.description: Experimenting with an electric drum using a raspberry pi and accelerometers.
projects.image_alt: a close up of some wires in a breadboard for a raspberry pi

projects.title: WakeTimes - Simple Timezone Matching
projects.description: Built to help people across different timezones organise their communication schedule.
projects.image_alt: a screenshot from the waketimes tool, showing the overlap multiple timezones

projects.title: NZ Prisons Analysis & Directory
projects.description: A data driven, dynamic directory of New Zealand's prisons, and a visualization and analysis of Dept Corrections and Justice data.
projects.image_alt: a zoomed in satellite image of part of Auckland Prison

projects.title: Explore Melbourne's Foot Traffic
projects.description: An R Shiny Web app built to help people understand how the time of the day, the day of the week, and the Covid-19 Lockdown influence the number of pedestrians throughout the City of Melbourne, Australia.
projects.image_alt: a screenshot of a map showing the locations of pedestrian traffic in Melbourne

projects.title: Support Black Owned Restaurants in LA
projects.description: An interactive map to help people on instagram find and support black owned restaurants in Los Angeles.
projects.image_alt: a screenshot of a map showing the locations of restaurants in Los Angeles

projects.title: Companion Planting Dataset
projects.description: A data set containing info about the relationships between plants to help with companion planting. Scraped from Wikipedia, cleaned to only include relationships with references.
projects.image_alt: an black and white vector illustration of different fruit and vegetables

educational.title: Batch Size & Learning Rate's effect on gradient descent visualised with learning curves
educational.description: Expand your understanding of the effect of batch size and learning rate on gradient descent.
educational.image_alt: a poorly drawn pixel art image of a learning curve plot

educational.title: Git Collaborative Workflows Cheatsheet
educational.description: A few key git workflows to help beginner-intermediate coders learn to work as a team.
educational.image_alt: a team of rowers collaborating together at sunset

educational.title: Meet your computer & build your first data laboratory
educational.description: A resource for computer & data newbies to set their computer up for basic data science. Tools: Python, Command Line, Jupyter notebooks. (currently for Mac only, to be cont.)
educational.image_alt: a cartoon emoji of a baby chick hatching out of an egg

educational.title: School School - Educational Website
educational.description: School School is designed to help R users expand their data visualisation toolbox. Every graph on this site includes the real world data and easy to understand R code you need to create it yourself.
educational.image_alt: a vector illustration of a pencil bent into an S shape
